title: Use of transcriptomics and genomics to assess the effect of disinfectant exposure on the survival and resistance of
authors: Kirchner M, Nunez-Garcia J, Duggett N, Gosling RJ, Anjum MF
abstract: Disinfectants are essential for biosecurity, preventing the persistence and spread of zoonotic pathogens on farms and subsequent human infections. In this study, transcriptomics and genomics were utilised to assess the effect of disinfectant exposure on pathogenic
